Claim: "The mechanic is wearing an orange jumpsuit while working on the train."
Implication: "The mechanic is working on the train."
Referring expressions: The mechanic, orange jumpsuit, train  The mechanic, train
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsWearing(a,c) and IsOnTrain(b)))) & (forall e (forall d ( IsWearing(d,e) ->  IsWorking(d))))) -> (exists a (exists b (IsWorking(a) and IsOnTrain(b))))
